title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Machine Learning-Based Data-Driven Modeling for Process Mechanics

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Design differential-algebraic equation-based modeling frameworks by integrating physical laws of machining mechanics with machine learning techniques
Implement machine learning models to estimate nonlinear process damping and edge forces from noisy experimental data
Automatically discover governing equations of machining mechanics systems by applying CMML (Cutting Mechanics-based Machine Learning) methodology
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
